entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
